batch_role: Data Transfer Objects and Service Implementation for managing problem sets in a programming-related application.
key_features: Encapsulation of problem set data and pagination information.
Support for JSON serialization using Jackson.
Static factory methods for creating DTO instances.
Service methods for retrieving, creating, modifying, and deleting problem sets.
Integration with Spring Data for database operations.
Handling of user authentication status and search functionalities.
project_hints: The project involves managing and presenting problem sets, likely for programming challenges or competitions.
Focus on efficient data handling with pagination and search functionalities.
User authentication and category management are integral to the application.
